Broker Fee Calculator

Complete

2019

  • javascript
  • nyc
  • Project URL: https://broker-fee.glitch.me/
  • Source URL: https://glitch.com/edit/#!/broker-fee

A calculator that shows what the effective rent would be for an apartment with the broker fee added to the rent.
